void MainWindow::AddVideoView ( QString  file  )  [private]

Adds a video.

If the video file is not found, this function reports it but nevertheless creates the GUI elements.

Warning:
: Phonon's ability to render the video isn't tested. File existence is tested outside of Phonon

void MainWindow::findlinks (  )  [private]

unsigned MainWindow::GetCenterSample ( int  idx,
bool  effective = true 
) [private]

returns the center sample, or the current video timecode, corresponding to source idx

flag effective only applies to video. When true, returns the current, visible, video position. When false, returns 'centersample'. Used when scrolling linked sources to ensure smoothness of scrolling.

std::vector< std::vector< int > > MainWindow::LoadSignalFile ( string  file,
int &  rv,
bool  report = true 
) [private]

Load a data source from a file. Return format: data[channel][samples].

rv: return value. 0: success -1: file not found -2: invalid file content

Parses signed integers space or tab separated. Handles special entries of the form 'NaN' and replaces them by zeroes.

void MainWindow::MergeFiles (  )  [private]

Prepares to merge the files. Ensures the sources to merge are all of identical length. If they are of identical length assume they were resampled.

bool MainWindow::OLSQRegress ( std::vector< double >  x1,
std::vector< double >  x2,
double &  a,
double &  b 
) [private]

Ordinary Least Square Regression.

Finds a and b so that: x2 = b*x1 + a

Returns false if regression is not possible, true otherwise.

void MainWindow::ResampleInPlace ( map< int, RESAMPLEREL >  m,
bool  prepend,
bool  postpend 
) [private]

Resample in-place.

map< int, RESAMPLEREL > MainWindow::ResampleLogic ( vector< RELATIONS >  Graphs,
bool  prepend 
) [private]

Computes the resample actions to execute.

Returns a map linking a source (first) to a resample relation (second, RESAMPLEREL) The resample relation includes:

  • the resample ratio (second.m)
  • the (optional) offset to prepend (second.o). If not used, it is set to 0
  • the optional padding at the enf of the signal (second.p). If not used, it is set to 0.

void MainWindow::ResampleMatlab ( map< int, RESAMPLEREL >  m,
bool  nn,
bool  prepend,
bool  postpend 
) [private]

SIGNALDATA MainWindow::ResampleSignalData ( SIGNALDATA &  sigdataorg,
double  resample,
int  padleft,
int  padright 
) [private]

Resamples sigdataorg with the resample factor. resample < 1.0. FrqOld/FrqNew = resample.
